name: Faith or Death
description:
In Faith or Death, you have an important mission. You believe you hold the power to stop the zombie apocalypse, only if you reach a special place.

This game is still in prototype phase, and this build is simply to get your feedback early on.

You get 5 waves of zombies in one of the levels. Probably easy to beat, but I think it's the best way to find bugs and get a feel of the game. Oh, and there's no sound yet.

I would really appreciate it if you leave a comment or contact me in anyway with your feedback.

Controls

Play with a keyboard & mouse or game pad.

Social

Find the creator on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube.
